Acolyte.name: Tradition
Acolyte.description: The ancient traditions of worship and sacrifice must be preserved and upheld.

Acolyte.name: Charity
Acolyte.description: I always try to help those in need, no matter what the personal cost.

Acolyte.name: Change
Acolyte.description: We must help bring about the changes the gods are constantly working in the world.

Acolyte.name: Power
Acolyte.description: I hope to one day rise to the top of my faith's religious hierarchy.

Acolyte.name: Faith
Acolyte.description: I trust that my deity will guide my actions. I have faith that if I work hard, things will go well.

Acolyte.name: Aspiration
Acolyte.description: I seek to prove my self worthy of my god's favor by matching my actions against his or her teachings.

Charlatan.name: Independence
Charlatan.description: I am a free spirit--no one tells me what to do.

Charlatan.name: Fairness
Charlatan.description: I never target people who can't afford to lose a few coins.

Charlatan.name: Charity
Charlatan.description: I distribute money I acquire to the people who really need it.

Charlatan.name: Creativity
Charlatan.description: I never run the same con twice.

Charlatan.name: Friendship
Charlatan.description: Material goods come and go. Bonds of friendship last forever.

Charlatan.name: Aspiration
Charlatan.description: I'm determined to make something of myself.

Criminal.name: Honor
Criminal.description: I don't steal from others in the trade.

Criminal.name: Freedom
Criminal.description: Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them.

Criminal.name: Charity
Criminal.description: I steal from the wealthy so that I can help people in need.

Criminal.name: Greed
Criminal.description: I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy.

Criminal.name: People
Criminal.description: I'm loyal to my friends, not to any ideals, and everyone else can take a trip down the Styx for all I care.

Criminal.name: Redemption
Criminal.description: There's a spark of good in everyone.

Entertainer.name: Beauty
Entertainer.description: When I perform, I make the world better than it was.

Entertainer.name: Tradition
Entertainer.description: The stories, legends, and songs of the past must never be forgotten.

Entertainer.name: Creativity
Entertainer.description: The world is in need of new ideas and bold action.

Entertainer.name: Greed
Entertainer.description: I'm only in it for the money and fame.

Entertainer.name: People
Entertainer.description: I like seeing the smiles on people's faces when I perform. That's all that matters.

Entertainer.name: Honesty
Entertainer.description: Art should reflect the soul; it should come from within and reveal who we really are.

Folk Hero.name: Respect
Folk Hero.description: People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect.

Folk Hero.name: Fairness
Folk Hero.description: No one should get preferential treatment before the law, and no one is above the law.

Folk Hero.name: Freedom
Folk Hero.description: Tyrants must not be allowed to oppress the people.

Folk Hero.name: Might
Folk Hero.description: If I become strong, I can take what I want--what I deserve.

Folk Hero.name: Sincerity
Folk Hero.description: There's no good pretending to be something I'm not.

Folk Hero.name: Destiny
Folk Hero.description: There's no good pretending to be something I'm not.

Guild Artisan.name: Community
Guild Artisan.description: It is the duty of all civilized people to strengthen the bonds of community and the security of civilization.

Guild Artisan.name: Generosity
Guild Artisan.description: My talents were given to me so that I could use them to benefit the world.

Guild Artisan.name: Freedom
Guild Artisan.description: Everyone should be free to pursue his or her livelihood.

Guild Artisan.name: Greed
Guild Artisan.description: I'm only in it for the money.

Guild Artisan.name: People
Guild Artisan.description: I'm committed to the people I care about, not to ideals.

Guild Artisan.name: Aspiration
Guild Artisan.description: I work hard to be the best there is at my craft.

Hermit.name: Greater Good
Hermit.description: My gifts are meant to be shared with all, not used for my own benefit.

Hermit.name: Logic
Hermit.description: Emotions must not cloud our sense of what is right and true, or our logical thinking.

Hermit.name: Free Thinking
Hermit.description: Inquiry and curiosity are the pillars of progress.

Hermit.name: Power
Hermit.description: Solitude and contemplation are paths toward mystical or magical power.

Hermit.name: Live and Let Live
Hermit.description: Meddling in the affairs of others only causes trouble.

Hermit.name: Self Knowledge
Hermit.description: If you know yourself, there're nothing left to know.

Noble.name: Respect
Noble.description: Respect is due to me because of my position, but all people regardless of station deserve to be treated with dignity.

Noble.name: Responsibility
Noble.description: It is my duty to respect the authority of those above me, just as those below me must respect mine.

Noble.name: Independence
Noble.description: I must prove that I can handle myself without the coddling of my family.

Noble.name: Power
Noble.description: If I can attain more power, no one will tell me what to do.

Noble.name: Noble Obligation
Noble.description: It is my duty to protect and care for the people beneath me.

Outlander.name: Change
Outlander.description: Life is like the seasons, in constant change, and we must change with it.

Outlander.name: Greater Good
Outlander.description: It is each person's responsibility to make the most happiness for the whole tribe.

Outlander.name: Honor
Outlander.description: If I dishonor myself, I dishonor my whole clan.

Outlander.name: Might
Outlander.description: The strongest are meant to rule.

Outlander.name: Nature
Outlander.description: The natural world is more important than all the constructs of civilization.

Outlander.name: Glory
Outlander.description: I must earn glory in battle, for myself and my clan.

Sage.name: Knowledge
Sage.description: The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge.

Sage.name: Beauty
Sage.description: What is beautiful points us beyond itself toward what is true.

Sage.name: Logic
Sage.description: Emotions must not cloud our logical thinking.

Sage.name: No Limits
Sage.description: Nothing should fetter the infinite possibility inherent in all existence.

Sage.name: Power
Sage.description: Knowledge is the path to power and domination.

Sage.name: Self-Improvement
Sage.description: The goal of a life of study is the betterment of oneself.

Sailor.name: Respect
Sailor.description: The thing that keeps a ship together is mutual respect between captain and crew.

Sailor.name: Fairness
Sailor.description: We all do the work, so we all share in the rewards.

Sailor.name: Freedom
Sailor.description: The sea is freedom--the freedom to go anywhere and do anything.

Sailor.name: Master
Sailor.description: I'm a predator, and the other ships on the sea are my prey.

Sailor.name: People
Sailor.description: I'm committed to my crewmates, not to ideals.

Sailor.name: Aspiration
Sailor.description: Someday I'll own my own ship and chart my own destiny.

Soldier.name: Greater Good
Soldier.description: Our lot is to lay down our lives in defense of others.

Soldier.name: Responsibility
Soldier.description: I do what I must and obey just authority.

Soldier.name: Independence
Soldier.description: When people follow orders blindly they embrace a kind of tyranny.

Soldier.name: Might
Soldier.description: In life as in war, the stronger force wins.

Soldier.name: Live and Let Live
Soldier.description: Ideals aren't worth killing for or going to war for.

Soldier.name: Nation
Soldier.description: My city, nation, or people are all that matter.

Urchin.name: Respect
Urchin.description: All people, rich or poor, deserve respect.

Urchin.name: Community
Urchin.description: We have to take care of each other, because no one else is going to do it.

Urchin.name: Change
Urchin.description: The low are lifted up, and the high and mighty are brought down. Change is the nature of things.

Urchin.name: Retribution
Urchin.description: The rich need to be shown what life and death are like in the gutters.

Urchin.name: People
Urchin.description: I help people who help me--that's what keeps us alive.

Urchin.name: Aspiration
Urchin.description: I'm going to prove that I'm worthy of a better life.
